text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC #Cooper2020 He has a double digit lead over what’s his name. His approval rating is higher than yours. His COVID-19 response approval is higher than yours. U suck! Stay out of my state you bum. People that went to your rally have COVID. DNC would be worse.
